content:
Errors of Omission: Multiple Sufficient Causes

    IF There are features that indicate an influence
    THEN Create a new conjunct of the features indicative
      of the influence
    Current Hypothesis: ((age adult)) ? (inflate balloon)
    Example: (color yellow) (size small) (act stretch) (age child): (inflate balloon)
    New Hypothesis: ((act stretch)) ???(age adult)) ? (inflate balloon)
    Influence: (easier (more-elastic) (inflate balloon))
    Inference Rule: (act stretch) ???(more-elastic)

Previous slide Next slide Back to first slide View graphic version
